attributes.action: Block any US/UK trade deal giving US Health Industry access to run NHS services.
attributes.additional_details: President Trump say he wants the NHS to be "on the plate" in any US/UK trade deal. Makes it sound like a nice slice of Mississippi Mud Pie. Such a situation would soon see the NHS eaten up by private health insurance interests.
attributes.background: Any Trade Deal with the USA should not give in Private American Health interests access to run NHS services. This would end the NHS by destroying the ethos our Health Service was created.
